com.jgefroh.core
Class Core

java.lang.Object
  com.jgefroh.core.Core

public class Core
extends java.lang.Object

The core class is the heart of the game. It keeps track of all Entities, InfoPacks, and Systems. It monitors Entities for changes in their composition, and automatically updates their associated InfoPacks.

Since:
18MAY13
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Joseph Gefroh

Method Detail

addEntity

public void addEntity(IEntity entity)
Start tracking and using an entity. This also generates all of the InfoPacks associated with the entity.

Parameters:
entity - the IEntity to track

addInfoPack

public void addInfoPack(IEntity entity,
                        IInfoPack infoPack)
Start tracking and using an info pack associated with a given entity.

Parameters:
entity - the entity that "owns" the InfoPack
infoPack - the InfoPack to track

addFactory

public void addFactory(IInfoPackFactory factory)
Begin using an InfoPack factory to generate InfoPacks of a specific type.

Parameters:
factory - the Factory to begin using

addSystem

public void addSystem(ISystem system,
                      int priority)
Begin tracking and using a system.

Parameters:
system - the System to track and use
priority - the priority of the system
Systems execute based on their priority level.
0 is the highest priority, with increasing numbers being of lower priority.
A priority of -1 is used to indicate the lowest current priority and should be used when the order of execution does not matter for the system.

removeEntity

public void removeEntity(IEntity entity)
Stop tracking an entity.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity to stop tracking.
